price: Kandi mu by’ukuri twaremye umuntu (Adamu) tumukomoye mu ibumba ry’umwimerere.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min sulālatin min ṭīnin
